snippet: The fast-growing abuse of prescription drugs has reached maternity wards in hospitals across the country.
abstract: Study in The Journal of the American Medical Association highlights the fast-growing abuse of prescription drugs that has reached maternity wards in hospitals across the country; study finds that number of pregnant women addicted to opiate drugs, and the number of babies born experiencing withdrawal symptoms, has risen sharply over the last decade.
lead_paragraph: The fast-growing abuse of prescription drugs has reached maternity wards in hospitals across the country.

headline.seo: Prescription Drug Abuse Soars Among Pregnant Women
headline.main: Abuse of Opiates Soars in Pregnant Women
headline.print_headline: Abuse of Opiates Soars in Pregnant Women

keywords.value: Journal of the American Medical Assn
